summary: The diff implements a single-page IP lookup UI with React Query-based fetching, an extra-details toggle, and a consistent Tailwind theme. It also adds unrequested Internet Identity/actor plumbing, toast infrastructure, and an (empty) Motoko backend actor.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider and related identity state management added to the app bootstrap.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for authentication or Internet Identity integration for this IP lookup page.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor/agent creation hook and query invalidation logic for a Motoko backend actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on client-side IP detection/lookup via React Query; it does not request backend actor usage or actor lifecycle management.

hallucinated_features.description: Empty placeholder file for backend queries stating backend actor is not used.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest only specifies React Query usage for IP detection/lookup and does not require a placeholder queries module.

hallucinated_features.description: Toast notification system (Sonner Toaster) added to the root app component.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request toast notifications; it only requires readable error messages in the UI.

hallucinated_features.description: New Motoko backend actor file added with an empty actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend changes are not required by the BuildRequest, and the added actor contains no functionality related to the requested IP lookup features.
